ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Box, & FREE 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
12 Cameras: 6*Bullet Cameras, 1/3" SONY Exview HAD CCD II Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal Manual Zoom lens, 72pcs IR LED, 196 ft IR Distance ;; 6*Dome Cameras, 1/3" SONY EXview HAD CCD II Vandalproof IR Dome Camera, 700 TV lines, 36 LEDs, 98.4 feet IR Distance, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens, 0.001 Lux
16 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 4TB HDD, 960H/FD1 video input, 8 full Channel Realtime Playback; Support HDMI/VGA/BNC/SPOT/Loop Simultaneous Output; Support AVI Backup,Snapshot,Record Lock,Record Cutting; Support up to 8 Hard Drives.
iPhone/Android Viewable, PTZ Control.
FREE 1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
